Since Gov. Walz and MDH announced 5-point "battle plan" to address COVID-19 deaths in long-term care two weeks ago today, another 229 LTC residents have died. That's 83% of 275 deaths since May 8. The overall death rate in LTC has gone from 81% to 82% since the plan was unveiled.
